Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2010 05:00AM dtol wrote: HI Cathy JJ, I think you might be going through the same thing I am right now and it seems that there is not much information, This is what I have been told to date, mammogram found cyst on right breast , not on previous mammograms, completed ultra sound and determined cat. 4, needed Core Biopsy. Core biopsy found a mucinous matter in cyst. they can not rule out the possibility of Mucinous  Carcinoma with out doing a surgical biopsy. I did ask the dr. if I could just be mucinous matter that if left alone would not turn into Carcinoma and he said he could not tell me that. The only way to rule out breast Cancer is to have the surgical Biopsy. Were they albe to rule out Carcinoma with your core biopsy.  I will be happy to update you with any information from my surgical biopsy.
Posts.Title: core biopsie cathyjj dtol

Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2010 04:16PM - edited Mar 1, 2010 04:16PM by dtol Karen1967, I agree with everyone else get the second opinion .  Raili, I had the same experience with my BS, the radiologist said I had to have a surgical biopsy based on my core biospy results, and when I went to the BS he almost talked me out of it wanting to wait the 6 months. So I talked to my radiologist again and she confirmed it was best  not to wait. I find this most frustrating the doctors do not seem to agree on what is the best approach so how are we suppose to know. Any way had the lumpectomy last week get results in the morning.
Posts.Title: Doctor doesn't think it's "anything to worry about" Karen1967 victoriasecret

I also felt much better with the sports bra on.  Wishing you B9 results

Posts.Title: Scared and Alone Rosemary349 Rosemary349

Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2010 03:45PM - edited Feb 28, 2010 03:47PM by dtol Hi momto3kites, Well the reason is long but it here it is, I had not had a  mammogram in four years so I scheduled one for Dec. 09. I was then was called back end of Dec. for a second mammogram, they then decided to also do a ultra sound after the second mammogram, There was a lump in my right breast that had not been on previous mammograms..  I was then scheduled for a core biopsy the results came back from the core biopsy with mucinous cyst, due to a type of rare breast cancer mucinous carcinoma they sent me to the breast surgeon for a lumpectomy and now I wait for what I hope to be B9 results, my follow up with the surgeon is this Tuesday.  I will be sending you good thoughts for your surgery. Please let us know how you are.
Posts.Title: lumpectomy is finally scheduled, but I'm feeling selfish momto3kites momto3kites

Hope you have b9 results and enjoy your outing. Of course there will be the waiting for results so the party will take your mind off that.
